request.description: The strong aroma of Cinnamon is complemented by top notes of Lemon, Bergamot, and Orange. Middle notes of Ripe Cranberry and Anise, with bottom notes of Cool Mint & Fresh Balsam finish off this potent blend.
request.name: Cinnamon Dip

request.description: Celebrate with this blend of rich, creamy vanilla and a scrumptious cake accord.
request.name: Birthday Cake

request.description: This Lush dupe has a sweet delightful blend of banana cream pie, lemon zest and peach nectar.
request.name: Snow Fairy

request.description: Whisk yourself away to an exotic island while inhaling the fresh aroma of citrus fruits interlaced with a floral bouquet of aromatic spices, fresh cut flowers and crisp green notes. Rich, warm and tangy spices harmonize with delightfully fruity and nutty coconut scents. Creamy vanilla interknits with warm musk to enhance this fragrance.
request.name: Pink Sands

request.description: Fresh squeezed oranges spiced with clove.
request.name: Orange Clove

request.description: A blend of sugar dipped berries, whipped cream, pink cotton candy and sexy noir.

request.description: A frisky blend of apple, pear, melon, vanilla ano musk.
